items.sentence: I\'ve always wanted to learn to play the drums.
I\'ve been trying to reach Tom since yesterday.
I\'ve been waiting for this moment all my life.
Tom got a toy hammer and toolbox for Christmas.
Tom got into the car and slammed the door shut.
Tom grabbed his guitar and headed for the door.
Tom has been in the bathroom for quite a while.
Tom seems to be expecting Mary to do something.
Tom set the table for dinner while Mary cooked.
Tom shared a room with his younger sister Mary.
Tom should be able to complete the job quickly.
Tom showed Mary how to use the washing machine.
In other words, I don\'t like to work with him.
Tom and Mary sat at opposite ends of the couch.
Tom and Mary seem to be more than just friends.
Tom and Mary spend a lot of money on their son.
Tom and Mary spent all morning baking cupcakes.
Tom doesn\'t have as much energy as he used to.
Tom doesn\'t know anything about the situation.
Tom doesn\'t understand why Mary is so popular.
Tom doesn\'t yet know whether he can go or not.
Tom dropped by Mary\'s house just to say hello.
Tom definitely earns more money than Mary does.
Tom definitely knows what Mary wants him to do.
Tom definitely needs to be a bit more sociable.
I\'m looking forward to spending time with Tom.
I\'m looking forward to visiting Tom in Boston.
I\'m much better at reading French than Tom is.
I\'m not sure that I understand what Tom meant.
Since my mother was sick, I couldn\'t go there.
I just don\'t feel like doing my math homework.
I have a lot of patients who are older than me.
I have a sore throat. Do you have a cough drop?
I have been to the station to see my uncle off.
I have no choice but to eat what they serve me.
I have no idea to what extent I can trust them.
Tom wants his father buried next to his mother.
We took a back road to avoid the heavy traffic.
What were you doing when I called this morning?
When Tom and I were in Boston, we visited Mary.
When Tom was a child, his family was very poor.
When was the last time that you were this busy?
I told Tom that I wasn\'t very good at cooking.
Tom can\'t be expected to do that without help.
Tom is your daughter\'s best friend, isn\'t he?
I don\'t know how to say "thank you" in French.
I don\'t know what to buy him for his birthday.
I don\'t know what to do about his shoplifting.
I don\'t know whether I need to do that or not.
Tom\'s friends knew Tom couldn\'t speak French.
